Name: GroundFall
About the game: Groundfall is a bush flying, survival game in a rugged open-world wilderness setting! Fly aerial missions while working to keep yourself and your airplane in one piece. When you're not flying, you'll be busy surviving! Survival Features: Multiple weapons, tools, and resources can be crafted, found, or unlocked. ** Craft primitive tools and weapons ** Build shelters, cabins, runways, etc. ** Gather, harvest, and hunt food and other resources ** Mange energy, hunger, and thirst ** not supported in the multi-player version Environmental Features: Open world maps and missions Lush ground vegetation and trees Simulated seasonal weather with rain, snow, lightning Volumetric fog/clouds AI wildlife provide predator and prey Flight Features: Realistic flight physics Airplane damage/repair system Airplane fueling system Flaps Water assisted landings (hydro-plane) Upgrade/modify airplane components Terrain friction (wet grass, mud, snow)
Meta Title: GroundFall: Sep 24, 2022, Snow Creature and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on GroundFall? Check out the release date (Sep 24, 2022), developer insights from Snow Creature, and a complete game summary.
